Both the coarse - grain module and the f.from sentence: Both the coarse - grain module and the fine - grain module significantly contribute to model performance .

under-performs.from sentence: The fine - grain - only model under-performs the coarse - grain - only model consistently across almost all length measures .

coarse - grain - only model.from sentence: However , the fine - grain - only model matches or outperforms the coarse - grain - only model on examples with a large number of support documents or with long support documents .

less performance degradation.from sentence: Replacing selfattention layers with mean - pooling and the bidirectional GRUs with unidirectional GRUs result in less performance degradation .

Replacing.from sentence: Replacing the encoder with a projection over word embeddings result in significant performance drop , which suggests that contextual encodings that capture positional information is crucial to this task .
